content:
New month new games PERIOD If youre looking for the next free game to dive into then check out our list of free games for the month of April PERIOD

Free Game with Prime

For Prime Gaming subscribers get ready for aerial shootemups chaotic couch coops and stories that tug at your heart strings PERIOD

Move or Die  Couch Party Edition  As the name says if you dont move you die PERIOD Any character that remains still will explode in this friendshipdestroying game PERIOD Up to  friends can go headtohead in a series of 20second rounds with everchanging modes PERIOD This party game will result in plenty of laughs and screaming PERIOD

The Escapists  This popular sandbox puzzler gives the player one objective escape prison PERIOD Live out your prison routine make friends or enemies and craft your master plan PERIOD With its procedural style and highly interactable sandbox The Escapists promises plenty of chaotic fun for any daring inmates PERIOD

Moving Out  Looking for a fun couch coop experience Moving Out has you covered as you and your friends deal with the fastpaced world of house moving PERIOD Prepare to deal with inane physics and fumbling teammates as you try to grow your fledgling moving company PERIOD

Aces of the Luftwaffe  Squadron  Set in an alternate history of World War  Germany has invaded the United States and its up to you to take to the skies in this scrolling shootemup PERIOD Go at it solo or bring a friend as you fight fearsome war machines and enemy squadrons in this colorful action game PERIOD Prepare for bullet hell and gather power ups as you take on challenging boss fights PERIOD

Before I Forget  Before I Forget is a narrativedriven game about losing your memories PERIOD You play as a woman with early onset dementia as you try to piece together clues about your past PERIOD Your memories fade and jumble together in this heartbreaking look into living with dementia PERIOD For those looking for a story that will stay with you consider giving this game a shot PERIOD

Games with Gold

For Xbox Live Gold members get ready to dive into Viking mythology parallel dimensions and truck racing this month PERIOD

Vikings Wolves of Midgard  This actionRPG in the vein of the Diablo games sets the player in the world of Norse mythology PERIOD Slay beasts and earn loot as you master an array of weapons PERIOD From axes and bows choose how you wish to forge your Viking legend PERIOD

Truck Racing Championship  If you ever wanted to live out the fantasy of taking part in the European Truck Racing then boy do we have the game for you PERIOD With lifelike simulation of truck racing and over  trucks to choose from enjoy your career as a master truck racer PERIOD

Dark Void  In Dark Void you find yourself stranded in a parallel dimension by alien forces PERIOD Equipped with hightech weapons and a jet pack get ready for frenetic pulpy action PERIOD Transition from on the ground shootouts to aerial dogfights seamlessly in this thirdperson shooter PERIOD

Hard Corps Uprsising  This retrostyled action game draws inspiration from the classic Contra games PERIOD Get the classic experience in the Arcade mode or become the ultimate soldier with upgrades as you take on the game in the Uprising mode PERIOD

PlayStation Plus

PlayStation owners get quite the selection this month including a brand new release and a PlayStation exclusive for this month PERIOD

Oddworld Soulstorm  The longawaited entry to the Oddwrold series make its premiere this month and PS5 owners will be able to play it for free on day one PERIOD Soulstorm continues to follow Abe a former slave who has now become a messianic figure as he liberates his people PERIOD Use crafting stealth and puzzle solving as Abe works with his people to fight for their freedom PERIOD

Days Gone  This PlayStation exclusive from Sony Bend come for free to PlayStation Plus members PERIOD Players take on the role of wandering motorcyclist Deacon St PERIOD John as they brave the perils of the postapocalypse PERIOD Maintain your motorcycle and survive the elements in a world overrun by mutants and bandits PERIOD

Zombie Army  Dead War  A spinoff of the Sniper Elite series Dead War ups the ante on insanity as you take on the undead Nazi horde yet again PERIOD Battle across Europe alone or with friends with crazy weaponry as you take on both Nazi zombies and the occult PERIOD
